author: timbeiko
content: The `0x44` opcode, pre-merge, returns `difficulty`, but post-merge it points to a different value, `prevRandao`, which is stored in the `mixHash` field of the EL block headers. We did not want to store `prevRandao` in `difficulty` to not cause weird issues in clients if the difficulty in headers suddenly jumps a ton. Similarly, we didn't want to change the EL block header format, which would break tooling.
